body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Steven Ward and the customer's name is Rose Hernandez.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Steven Ward, and I'm with Phat Hogs, the premier motorcycle dealership. How can I help you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, Steven. I'm Rose Hernandez, and I'm looking for some information about your motorcycle options.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Rose! We have a wide variety of motorcycles for every type of rider. May I ask which model you are interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm really interested in the cruiser models, but I'm a bit overwhelmed with the choices.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That's understandable! Cruisers are fantastic for comfort and style. Could I get your contact number to provide you with more information?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And just to ensure we have all the necessary details, could you please provide your email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's rose.hernandez at example dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect! I will send you some information on our cruiser models, along with any current promotions.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Steven! I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome, Rose. Thank you for your time, and I hope you have a great day!
